name: TETRIS TOWER
description:
Controls:

●Use Left and Right Arrow keys to move left and right.

●Use A and D to  rotate.

● Hold Down Arrow key to move down faster.

____________________________________________________________

As in the name, you have to make a tower  of tetrominoes.  Place them right or they will fall off. You have 5 lives so play wisely. There's a timer which shows how long the game lasted before you lost all your lives.

This game is submitted to the Bada-Soch Game Jam hosted by Nikhil Malankar.

Enjoy!
